name: West Lake Peach Garden Apt - Unit 1310
address: Unit 1310 Peach Garden building, 689 Lac Long Quan, Tay Ho District, Tay Ho District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Situated in Hanoi, this apartment features a balcony. The unit is 2.6 km from Phu Tay Ho, and guests benefit from free WiFi and private parking available on site.

The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher and an oven, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. A flat-screen TV and a laptop are featured.

West Lake is 3.8 km from West Lake Peach Garden Apt - Unit 1310, while Tran Quoc Pagoda is 4.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 15 km from West Lake Peach Garden Unit 1310.
